posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rob D.
During the past six months or so I've been putting together a Cleveland team set of T206s, with the only guideline being that I would try to compile a group that's fairly diverse. Ideally, I'd like to get one of almost every back, though I'm not married to notion of obtaining every last example. In addition to different backs, I've added two cards from Lionel Carter's collection, one PSA 7 (MC) and a couple Hall of Famers with not-so-common backs (Young glove showing/Tolstoi and Flick and Lajoie/Hindus).

My goal isn't the super rare or the "ultra-high grade," though I certainly would welcome a chance at a Drum or a PSA 8. Basically, I'd like to hear what you have available for sale or trade. Listed below are the players I have, but just because a player is listed doesn't mean I wouldn't be interested in "upgrading" to something more unusual or tougher. I'd really like to add an American Beauty (either series), Carolina Brights, El Principe De Gales, Lenox and/or Uzit.

Thanks in advance for sharing what you might have available.

Rob
wolfie51sb@aol.com

Cleveland players I have:

Neal Ball
Ted Easterly
Elmer Flick
Wilbur Goode
Addie Joss portrait
Addie Joss pitching
Nap Lajoie portrait
Nap Lajoie throwing
Nap Lajoie with bat
Cy Young portrait
Cy Young glove shows
Cy Young bare hand shows
